resources.string:
Human emotion detection is the process of identifying human emotions from a picture. With this app, you can upload an image and we will first use a face detection algorithm to determine if there is a face(s) present or not and if there is, make a one of 7 emotion predictions: Angry, Happy, Sad, Neutral, Disgust, Surprise and Fear as well as a percentage indicating how certain the algorithm is on the prediction. The predictions are made with convolutional neural networks (CNN) which is currently the state of the art in image processing. The three models that are used are Inception-ResNetV1, MobileNet and Yolo3 and each having an accuracy of 69%, 67% and 48% respectively. In comparison, humans have an accuracy of 68 +- 5% when it comes to emotion prediction from faces according to one study. 

You can go to the “upload” tab to start predicting images or view a history of all your previous predictions in the “history” tab. 

Have fun predicting!
